name: The eidetic postman
description:
Hello!

Here's an alpha version of The eidetic postman.

First level will introduce you with the basics, second one has enabled random.

Controls:
Sideways - A and D or arrows. Action with the lift and apartments - F.

Sprint - shift.

There are a lot of things the game doesn't have like good texture, music and pretty UI right now. This version is for testing how good the idea is.  So please, leave your opinion in the comments.
